text:
YotaScale | Menlo Park | Software Engineers | All Levels | 100K - 200K + equity | FULLTIME, INTERNS, ONSITE | https://www.yotascale.com/ Yotascale combines deep infrastructure understanding with applied machine learning techniques to help our customers move to the cloud. We're VC-backed, our customers include some of the world's leading tech companies, and our leadership team includes industry veterans from PayPal and Google.

We are hiring for three positions (full stack developers feel free to apply to Frontend and Backend positions):

* Head of Machine Learning: https://jobs.lever.co/yotascale/919cd931-90cd-4add-bb66-ca0a...

* Senior Backend Engineer :Spark, Kafka, Scala, Java, Kubernetes, Docker- https://jobs.lever.co/yotascale/fbee06ba-66e7-4171-bf52-39f0...

* Junior to Senior Software Engineer: Angular, Python, Postgres - https://jobs.lever.co/yotascale/a33877ab-481c-4267-82f2-49da...
